resource.chars:
(4)
For reasons which I hope will be evident it will 
be impossible in the time at our disposal <s>and<\s> to 
<s>over the distance [text?] forward Scientific 
collections & notes by the 'Morning'. Mr Bernacchi 
has however forwarded typical monthly examples of the records obtained with the Eschenhagen 
instruments. I regret that the photographic 
paper for these instruments together with certain 
other scientific requirements will be insufficient for 
a second winter 
I have the honor to be 
Sir
Your obedient servant 
Rob F Scott
Captain 
The Secretary
National Antarctic Expedition
